website_summaries.verdict: Ideal if you're looking for a sturdy mask with extra protection over comfort.
pros: Solid wire frame with a built-in throat protector

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these I have had over the years first with fast pitch and now with modified softball. They have held up well and only needed to be replaced due to someone else believing they could not live without one. A little on the heavy side for some, but it works the neck muscles. It is possible to use this mask with glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond C

customer_reviews.title: Good, little heavy and can sweat...
customer_reviews.text: Use for catching my sons pitching in back yard. It is a little heavy, but u can get used to it if ur neck it strong. U will sweat in this unit as well. But it works fine for me with the kid pitching and a cap on backwards. I am good using this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for my 197O’s mask.
customer_reviews.text: Nice protection features and while heavier than the “light weight “ masks, still able to use with my 70 year old neck.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Really heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I knew that this could have been heavy, but not so much. Visibility is great and used with an helmet, it compensate the weight on your face. But if you "need" to wear it alone, forget to be able to wear it for more than 15-20 minutes. It will "break" your neck! By the way, it's well made. Straps are just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Mauro

customer_reviews.title: It works great. I almost forgot I used it when my ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a dad and coach and my son and I have both used this when we have umpired the little guys. It works great. I almost forgot I used it when my son was pitching to me in the backyard. It did a nice job then too.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Worth ever dollar.
customer_reviews.text: I umpire softball and it’s been proven durable against fall tips.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to wear while our middle schooler pitched to him - it fits his face perfectly and luckily he hasn't been hit yet! The product arrived in a timely manner and was exactly as described. I would highly recommend for home use; I don't consider myself qualified to know if this is a mask that you would want if you were a catcher on a competitive team.
customer_reviews.author: suzimoreland

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and neck pain for sure
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and hurts to wear. The padding is not very supportive and you feel everything that hits.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect

customer_reviews.title: The Rawlings PWMX Face mask is a great face mask for the money
customer_reviews.text: The Rawlings PWMX Face mask is a great face mask for the money. Adjust easily and it will take a shot as ,i already took 3- direct hits from 18 u girls softball fast pitch!

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than new teeth!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband who coaches a 13 U baseball team, he warms up the pitchers a lot and likes the convenience and protection of this mask and way cheaper than getting new teeth:)

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad for Christmas last year, & he absolutely loves it. (He is much more open to the idea of having things thrown at him when he has adequate protection.) It fits him, but barely. It is made to be worn over a helmet, so it's definitely not a good buy for a child, it would be way too big. As long as it fits, it works. It is a quality product & the Amazon price is unbeatable, as usual. I often see this same mask in sporting goods stores for 3x what I paid for it.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!

product_meta.title: Rawlings High Visibility PWMX Wire Baseball/Softball Umpire Mask
product_meta.description: The PWMX umpire mask from Rawlings features an extended frame for added throat and ear protection, vinyl coated, welded wire frame, snap-on pads and adjustable elastic cradle style harness. - High visibility design - Lightweight solid wire frame - Simulated leather pad covering - Built-in throat Protector - Includes harness
feature_bullets: Lightweight solid wire frame; Age: Adult & Level: Adult
